entries.title: Cybersquatting reached a new high this year
entries.description: Report claims a 10% year-on-year rise in cybersquatting issues.

entries.title: More developers reportedly now use Linux than macOS
entries.description: Stack Overflow study claims 2022 saw a huge shift towards Linux among developers, but Windows remains top dog.

entries.title: Thousands of WordPress sites hit by gift card plugin flaw
entries.description: Flaw has since been patched, with WordPress owners urged to apply it as soon as possible.

entries.title: Turn your Christmas leftovers into a tasty toastie with this viral TikTok air fryer recipe
entries.description: Here's how to turn your festive food leftovers into a tasty and comforting snack using your air fryer.

entries.title: Hacker claims to have private data of 400 million Twitter users for sale
entries.description: Twitter given ultimatum: buy the leaked data of more than 400 million users or let others get their hands on it.

entries.title: The Samsung Galaxy S22 FE may appear after all, with a new chipset inside
entries.description: Just as we'd given up hope for a budget version of the Galaxy S22, along comes another rumor to pull us back in.

entries.title: There's another really good reason not to download pirated software
entries.description: Researchers uncover a new infostealer hiding among pirated software.

entries.title: The most anticipated phones of 2023
entries.description: There are lots of exciting phones on the way in 2023, including foldables, flagships and many others. Here's our roundup of what to expect and when to expect them.

entries.title: Nvidia in 2022: year in review
entries.description: How did Nvidia fare over the past year? Strap yourself in tight, because the ride’s a bumpy one…
